title: The Peaceable Kingdom
description: Quakers. The Peaceable Kingdom tells the story of the Children of the Light and their Holy Experiment. Here they are many based on people who lived generation after generation, founding a new faith, seeking freedom in the New World, achieving a unique peace with the Indians, subduing the wilderness, struggling, experiencing triumphs of faith and deeds and defeats by nature and human frailty......
author: Jan de Hartog
